TopicTitle: Suspiciously Affirm Your Status As A Human

Articles.Content: Ah yes, I have planted a flag on <rand orbit line> and asserted dominance by t-posing in a <rand liquid>. Only possible for human.

9/10
A human. Robots normally can't tell such nonsense.

(Tells unnonsense instead).

3/10 Simple, Maybe to Simple

<html>

<header><title>Affirmation of homo sapiens status</title>

</head>

<body>

As you can see I am totally a homo sapiens.

</body>

</html>

Edited July 19, 2021 by Lancasterace

10/10
Only lazy human students never use the proper HTML header definitions and miss the opening <head> tag, writing <header> instead.

I wish they were using the HTML text validators.

8/10

Thread recognition error causes some doubt in underlying matrix.

I am aware of my own existance and so ergo I am human.

1/10
This will be fixed in the next firmware upgrade.

If I was not a human, I would play KSP via kRPC.

10/10

If you weren't human you wouldn't play KSP, you would be KSP.

I am human. Check mate in 102 moves.

0/10 argument did not make sense

im human because i... just am a human

10/10 Everyone will believe this

I am a human because I think monke funny

5/10

Only humonkeys think monke funny.

I do be being a human because I can into English verb tenses.

10/10

No self respecting AI would say that, and I should know.

Because I am human to the 333 decimal place.

9/10

Because humans wouldn't figure beyond the thousandth digit.

 

I am human because I have an opposable thumb to make it easier to type on mobile devices.

5/10

monkeys, pandas, etc etc have opposable thumbs too.

I am human because I make mistakes by myself

5/10 Definitely an organism of some sort, but any organism makes mistakes and so that is not a human trait.

I am definitely a sentient mammalian biped from Sol III, hello all other sentiences!

7/10

Maybe you are a trained kangaroo.

***

2 hours ago, iamn00b said:

monkeys, pandas, etc etc have opposable thumbs too.

But they don't have phones. Losers.

The human is the only species who has his thumb objective completed.

***

A human is not what's being as me. I don't use thumbs to type on smartphones, because I rarely use the mobile devices (I have a desktop in front of me), and type with the middle finger.

(On a smartphone. The desktop keyboard is used by me multifingeredly).

0/10

only shakespeare or an advanced AI can create such a complex and detailed sentence. the former is (physically) dead, so you're definitely the latter.

I am human because... well, I give up. no idea exactly what separates humanity apart from other beings. Label me whatever you want, but if you meet me in real life, you'll see that I am a real human.

5/10

A preprogrammed response machine I think. giving a 0/10 score feels like something only a machine would do.

I say I stink, therefore I'm man.

That exactly what a machine would say. 

5/10

I am a human as only a human can ask a question. As your... I mean our technology is not great enough. So am I human?

8/10

You might have a creative programmer.

Do I stink? Therefore am I?

Edited July 29, 2021 by ColdJ

5/10

Leaning towards Yoda, but not sure about human.

 

Raaaawwwrrrrr .. ruff

10/10
You drunk. Go sleep.

I got it, so I'm a human.

8/10

You might be Scooby Doo.

Shaggy says I am human so I must be.

9/10 human. You are good human.

Im sorry, are you trying to search herbal space products?

9/10.
Only the kerbalife.
And the fake politeness in your indifferent voice proves that your are a human.

Suvh deep knowledge of the human psychology is available only to us, the humans.

8/10

An Undead Frued back from the grave I think.

If only you could see what I have seen with your eyes, then you would know that I am human.
